thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com | 21 of 948
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: Great bundles, low prices, everything went flawlessly for those 4 transactions i made. The only things i don't like is the fact that website constantly lags when loading pages and that they don't have some way to simplify game activation process, by giving an option to merge the keys into one when ordering, like those old HIB keys which gave you all games at once.
